title: Breathing - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/1/21
itunes:title: Breathing - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/1/21
description:
George Noory and author James Nestor explore his research into the power of breathing properly, how humans lose the ability to breath the right way, and ways to breath to prevent anxiety and lower overall stress.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A discussion on ways to breath better to lower stress and improve your health.
